namespace.select:
select a.* from department as a
a.AggregateId = @AggregateId
a.Name = @Name

select p.* from (select row_number() over (order by id desc) as _, a.* from department as a
a.AggregateId = @AggregateId
a.Name = @Name
) as p where p._ >= @StartIndex and p._ <= @EndIndex

select count(a.Id) from department as a
a.AggregateId = @AggregateId
a.Name = @Name
namespace.update: update department set Version = Version + 1, Name = @Name, Descn = @Descn, EditDate = @EditDate, Editor = @Editor where AggregateId = @AggregateId and Version = @Version;
